gameFiles

Class BumperObstacleLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameFiles.ObstacleLine
      • gameFiles.BumperObstacleLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Obstacle

    public class BumperObstacleLine
extends ObstacleLine
    This class creates a bumber obstacle for the game. When hit it gives the player points.
    Version:
    4.0, June 12, 2014
    Author:
    Jason P'ng

    • Constructor Detail

      • BumperObstacleLine

        public BumperObstacleLine(double x1,
                          double y1,
                          double x2,
                          double y2)
        This is the constructor of this object, which creates a line defined by two points on the graphical display.
        The colour of ths line is always red, and will always give the player 10 points.
        Parameters:
        double - x1 Specifies the x-coord of the first point.
        double - x2 Specifies the x-coord of the second point.
        double - y1 Specifies the y-coord of the first point.
        double - y2 Specifies the y-coord of the second point.
